mmutilR 1.0.5
  • Reference

    Create pseudo-bulk data by aggregating columns

    rcpp_mmutil_aggregate.Rd

    Create pseudo-bulk data by aggregating columns

    rcpp_mmutil_aggregate(
  mtx_file,
  row_file,
  col_file,
  r_cols = NULL,
  r_indv = NULL,
  r_annot = NULL,
  r_annot_mat = NULL,
  r_lab_name = NULL,
  r_trt = NULL,
  r_V = NULL,
  a0 = 1,
  b0 = 1,
  eps = 1e-08,
  knn = 10L,
  KNN_BILINK = 10L,
  KNN_NNLIST = 10L,
  NUM_THREADS = 1L,
  IMPUTE_BY_KNN = TRUE
)

    Arguments

    mtx_file

    data file

    row_file

    row file

    col_file

    column file

    r_cols

    cell (col) names

    r_indv

    membership for the cells (r_cols)

    r_annot

    label annotation for the (r_cols)

    r_annot_mat

    label annotation matrix (cell x type) (default: NULL)

    r_lab_name

    label names (default: everything in r_annot)

    r_trt

    treatment assignment (default: NULL)

    r_V

    SVD factors (default: NULL)

    a0

    hyperparameter for gamma(a0, b0) (default: 1)

    b0

    hyperparameter for gamma(a0, b0) (default: 1)

    eps

    small number (default: 1e-8)

    knn

    k-NN matching

    KNN_BILINK

    num. of bidirectional links (default: 10)

    KNN_NNLIST

    num. of nearest neighbor lists (default: 10)

    NUM_THREADS

    number of threads for multi-core processing

    IMPUTE_BY_KNN

    imputation by kNN alone (default: TRUE)

    Value

    a list of inference results

    Contents

    Developed by Yongjin Park.
